item.title: A New Year, a new OS!
item.description: A New Year, a new operating system! After trying and failing numerous times to get Linux running satisfactorily via Oracle VirtualBox - I finally bit the bullet and went for a dual booting solution. After a week or so of using Linux, Ubuntu (18.04 LTS “Bionic Beaver”), I have to say that I’m loving it.
